1. City Council

City Council
============

* Every second Thursday of the month.
* City Hall Council Chambers
  509 E. Crockett Street
  Luling, TX 78648

![CJ Watts](http://www.cityofluling.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1086)

* **CJ Watts- Mayor**
* [mayor@cityofluling.net](mailto:mayor@cityofluling.net)

![Jackie Campbell](http://www.cityofluling.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=996)

* [councilward1@cityofluling.net](mailto:councilward1@cityofluling.net)
